2023.title: SwiftUI adoption surges
2023.description: Apple developers increasingly migrated to SwiftUI for declarative UI, leveraging improved async/await support in iOS 16+.

2023.title: ARKit & RealityKit gain adoption
2023.description: AR-based experiences were built using Apple's ARKit 6 and Reality Composer Pro, fostering interactive retail and education tools.

2023.title: Core ML powers on-device AI
2023.description: iOS developers adopted Core ML for image classification, sentiment analysis, and object detection, improving app privacy and performance.
